keyFacts: The document is a DOJ OIG transcription request form for an audio interview dated May 15, 2021.
The case number associated with the request is 2019016514.
The individuals Michael Thomas, Tova Noel, Nicholas Tarlaghone, and Efrain Reyes are listed as relevant names for the transcription.
The form indicates standard DOJ OIG administrative procedures for processing transcription requests.
